name: @capacitor/toast
description: The Toast API provides a notification pop up for displaying important information to a user. Just like real toast!
author: Ionic <hi@ionicframework.com>

scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:ios: cd ios && pod install && xcodebuild -workspace Plugin.xcworkspace -scheme Plugin && cd ..
scripts.verify:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean build test && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check && npm run swiftlint -- lint
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write && npm run swiftlint -- autocorrect --format
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js
